title: Highest Persistence to Grade 5
description: In 2021, 99.97% of students in Spain persisted to grade 5, indicating a strong education system.

title: Highest Persistence to Last Grade of Primary
description: In 2021, 99.94% of students in Spain persisted to the last grade of primary school, showcasing excellent educational retention.

title: Lowest Impact of Health Expenditure on Poverty
description: In 2019, only 0.01% of Spain's population was pushed further below the $3.65 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses, reflecting strong financial protection in health care.
